name: Onset Detection
description: Detect the onsets of notes in the musical audio in realtime based on a certain threshold.

inputs.name: Audio
inputs.description: The audio stream you want to detect the onsets

inputs.name: Threshold
inputs.description: The value of certain decibel level. When a note of the audio gets louder than this level, it is detected as an onset. Value range

outputs.name: Audio
outputs.description: Execute this node,  connect to a speaker to play the audio stream or connect to a Detection Output to finish the connect without play audio
